data.title: Alma Macrorie
data.meta_description: Alma Macrorie. Editor: Immer Ärger mit Harry. Alma Macrorie was born on 7 December 1904 in Davenport, Iowa, USA. She was an editor and actress, known for Immer Ärger mit Harry (1955), Die Brücken von Toko-Ri (1954) and Mutterherz (1946). She died on 28 June 1970 in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California, USA.
data.text: Alma Macrorie was born on December 7, 1904 in Davenport, Iowa, USA. She was an editor and actress, known for Immer Ärger mit Harry (1955), Die Brücken von Toko-Ri (1954) and Mutterherz (1946). She died on June 28, 1970 in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California, USA.
